Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Enywe Abandu, enywe muli abatakha khu Nyasaye, ne Nyasaye niye Omuyinda witsomibungwa muno
Ne niyenya nabarusiaho narera ebilonje bindi ebiyakha
Ne likhuwa elo shilili litinyu khu Nyasaye tawe

Ne Omundu shalichinga omusiko kwo uwundi tawe, ne ulia uliyingwa okhuchinga shalichinjilwa kata hatiti tawe, kata nali omwikho wuwe. Toto ewe wikanyilisinjia balia abaritsanga Nyasaye wabu Omulesi nabo nibashiili okhumulola ne balumililanga okhulaama (iswala) ne ulia witswenula yetswenulilanga omwoyo kukwe omwene , ne amakalushilo kali khu Nyasaye
Ne shibakhaba nashilala omuwofu nende ulolanga tawe
Nohomba eshilima nende obulafu
Nohomba eshinikha nende obubafu
Ne shibakhaba nashilala abalamu nende abafuu tawe. Nyasaye awulilisinjia owayenya, nawe shonyala okhuwulilisia bali mubilindwa tawe
Ewe oli butswa omwikanyilisi
Toto efwe khwakhuruma khubwatoto obe omusuubisia nende omwikanyilisi. Ne kubulaho omukanda kwosi kwosi okhula omwikanyilisi yoolamwo
Ne nibakhuyingasia bamala okhuyingasibwa balia abali imbeli wuwo, Abarumwa babu babeetsela nende ebifune bili habulafu nende mutsimbapulo nende ebitabu biobulafu
Mana nendila balia bakhaya. Mana eshinyasio shianje shiali shirie

Koo shololangakhwo mbu Nyasaye yeshinjia amatsi okhurula mwikulu mana nikhukarusilia ebiamo bikabukhane obukondo bwabio, ne mutsingulu khulimwo nende tsinyaali tsindafu nende tsinzakhanyu, etsiobukoondo bukabukhane, ne etsindi tsimali muno
Ne Mubandu nende tsisolo tsimoolanga nende tsisolo tsindi tsikabukhane obukondo, endio, Toto balia baritsanga Nyasaye Mubasumba bebe nibalia abamanya. Toto Nyasaye niwa Amaani Omulesheli muno
Toto balia basomanga eshitabu shia Nyasaye mana nibalumilila okhulaama mana nibarusia eshihanwa khubilia ebiakhubakabile mubwifisi nohomba mubwang’ang’u basubilanga inganga eyilalisikha tawe
Kho abarunge omurungo kwabu omulaamba , nende okhubametela okhurula khu tsimbabaasi tsistsie. Toto Ye ni Omulesheli muno owokhupa orio inyinji
Ne eshitabu shiakhwakhwishila mubufimbulinishioeshiatoto, shifuchilisania nende bilia abialiho embeli washio, toto Nyasaye yamanya muno Abasumba bebe ne abalolanga muno

Mana nikhuhelesia eshitabu balia abakhwawula mubasumba befu, ne mubo baliho bakholela obubii emioyo chiabu ne balimwo bali hakarikari, ne mubo baliho belushilanga amakhuwa amalayi, khubuchami bwa Nyasaye, obo nibo obulayi obukhongo
Emikunda chilaliwa tawe balinjilamwo balironwa ebirone bieyidhahabu nende ilulu, ne ebifwalo biabu mwo biliba bia hariri
Ne baliboola mbu : “oluyali lwosi nilwa Nyasaye owakhurusiliaho eshibeela , toto Nyasaye wefu ni Omulesheli muno owokhupa orio inyinji.”
Ulia khulwetsimbaasi tsitsie yakhura efwe habaandu okhumenya khatsotso
Ne balia bakhaya balinyoola omulilo kwa jahanam, shibalibusilibwa okhufwamwo tawe, ne shibalitutuyilibwa eshinyasio shiakwo tawe, ne endio nilwa khulirunga buli omukhayi

Ne omo balikhupamwo obuyoka: “Nyasaye wefu Omulesi khurusiemwo khwitsa okhukhola amalayi kalali kalia akakhwakholanga” “shikhwabahelesiamwo ebise biomundu okhwitsulila mana Omwikanyilisi nabetselamwo, kho mana mupile, ne Ababii babula ubahabina.”
Toto Nyasaye nomumanyi wakefisa komwikulu nende khushialo, toto ye ni Omumanyi muno khukali mumioyo

Ye niye wabakhola okhuba abalindi bokhushialo, kho ulia ukhaya buli khuye obukhayi bubwe, ne shibumetelanga abukhayi okhukhaya khwabu khu Nyasaye halali okhusilwa, ne okhukhaya khwabakhayi shikhubametanga shiosi shiosi tawe halali okhusikha

Boola mbu: “mulolangakhwo abamusanjinjia benyu abo abamulaamanga habundu wa Nyasaye, munzechesiekhwo nibuleka shina yokhushialo yabaloonga , nohomba balikho nende obusanji bwosi bwosi mwikulu? Nohomba khwabahelesia eshitabu mana bali nende ebifune bili habulafu.? Ne abamabii shibalakananga halali obubeyi butswa
